required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparison of the Visual Quality of Traditional Ultrasound Biometrics and Lenstar on the Cataract After Pars Plana Vitrectomy
clinical_study.official_title: Comparison of the Visual Quality of Traditional Ultrasound Biometrics and Lenstar on the Cataract After Pars Plana Vitrectomy

brief_summary.textblock: Comparison of the visual quality of traditional ultrasound biometrics and lenstar on the cataract patients with diabetic retinopathy after vitrectomy in the 3 months later.To evaluate the clinical value of lenstar in post-vitrectomy patients.

primary_outcome.measure: the visual quality of the eye after surgery
primary_outcome.description: the visual quality of the eye after surgery through optical path difference scan（OPD Scan）

primary_outcome.measure: the visual quality of the eye after surgery
primary_outcome.description: the visual quality of the eye after surgery through optical path difference scan（OPD Scan）

arm_group.description: The measurement of axial length was performed in 60 eyes (30 eyes for each group) with senile cataract of vitrectomised eye of diabetic retinopathy using lenstar and traditional ultrasonic biological combined with cornea curvimeter.In this group,we use traditional ultrasonic biological combined with cornea curvimeter to measure the ocular parameter.

The measurement of axial length was performed in 60 eyes (30 eyes for each group) with senile cataract of vitrectomised eye of diabetic retinopathy using lenstar and traditional ultrasonic biological combined with cornea curvimeter.In this group,we use lenstar to measure the ocular parameter.

intervention.description: To evaluate the clinical feasibility of using a new optical coherence interferometry ( lenstar ),comparing with traditional ultrasonic biometry and keratometry in the accuracy and characteristics for intraocular lens calculation of cataract after PPV

To evaluate the clinical feasibility of using a new optical coherence interferometry ( lenstar ),comparing with traditional ultrasonic biometry and keratometry in the accuracy and characteristics for intraocular lens calculation of cataract after PPV

study_pop.textblock: Patients with cataract after vitrectomy because of diabetic retinopathy.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Patients with cataract after vitrectomy because of diabetic retinopathy.
2. Patients with good fixation in order to cooperate with various examination.
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Myopia of >6 diopters
2. Ocular trauma and other eye disease accepted vitrectomy,such as branch retinal vein occlusion(BRVO),central retinal vein occlusion(CRVO).
3. Vision acuity <0.1
4. Silicone oil eye

responsible_party.investigator_title: Bojie Hu, Head of Ophthalmology department, Principal Investigator, Associate Senior Physician, Tianjin Medical University Eye Hospita
